list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a thing said or done that serves as a signal to an actor or other performer to enter or to begin their speech or performance.
a long, straight, tapering wooden rod for striking the ball in pool, billiards, snooker, etc.
give a cue to or for.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: curious pedestrians are cued by the arrival of stretch limousines
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Người đi bộ tò mò được cued bởi sự xuất hiện của limousine kéo dài

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: use a cue to strike a ball in pool, billiards, snooker, etc.
